# Prerequisites


## Software

* R 4.1.2 or later release [Download link](https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/CRAN/).

* Rstudio Desktop [Download link](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download).

## Requirements

The methods in **MicrobiomeAnalysis** requires that the users should have basic knowledge on R language and statistical background. **Statistical Analysis of Microbiome Data with R** [@xia2018statistical] might be a guide book for you.
